name: Alex MD21 29" 32H Disc Front Wheel - Unisex
description: This value-priced 29er front wheel is ideal for trail and cross-country mountain biking. Made from sturdy double wall aluminum rims, 32 DT stainless steel spokes and a hard-wearing Shimano M475 hub, it can be set-up tubeless for better puncture protection and optimal tire pressure. Comes with a 100 mm quick release.Aluminum double wall 29er rims.Designed with tubeless conversion in mind.32 DT stainless steel spokes.Hard-wearing Shimano M475 hub.Compatible with 6-bolt disc rotors.100 mm quick release.Inner rim width: 21mm.Outer rim width: 26mm.Rim height: 18mm.Presta valve.Rim weight: 500g.
